channel.title: Issues on France Grilles Cloud Status

item.title: [Resolved] UNIV-LILLE Datacenter Blackout
item.description: Description: Major maintenance of datacenter power supply (blackout) scheduled for October 19, 2021.
item.content: Description: Major maintenance of datacenter power supply (blackout) scheduled for October 19, 2021.

item.title: LUPM Maintenance
item.description: Description: The LUPM site will be down from the 2nd of August until the 10th of September, due to a scheduled network outage.
item.content: Description: The LUPM site will be down from the 2nd of August until the 10th of September, due to a scheduled network outage.

item.title: [Resolved] IPHC Maintenance
item.description: Description: The SCIGNE platform will be down from the 27th of July until the 29 of July, due to a scheduled power outage.
item.content: Description: The SCIGNE platform will be down from the 27th of July until the 29 of July, due to a scheduled power outage.

item.title: [Resolved] GRICAD Nova power cut
item.description: Description - The building where the Nova platform is hosted is currently undergoing an electric cut due to the section of a cable in a nearby street.
item.content: Description - The building where the Nova platform is hosted is currently undergoing an electric cut due to the section of a cable in a nearby street.

item.title: [Resolved] CPPM Maintenance
item.description: Description: The IN2P3-CPPM share service will be down the 21th June between 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM
item.content: Description: The IN2P3-CPPM share service will be down the 21th June between 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM

item.title: [Resolved] CC-IN2P3 Maintenance
item.description: Description - Migration of the GPFS plaftorm to CEPH. It may have some impact on the OpenStack Cloud Compute service.
item.content: Description - Migration of the GPFS plaftorm to CEPH. It may have some impact on the OpenStack Cloud Compute service.
